result.reason: The ObjectDisposedException on ConnectionWindow.Invoke is already guarded in the current codebase via IsDisposed/Disposing/IsHandleCreated checks in ShowHideConnectionTabs, HandleProtocolClosed, and ClosePanelIfEmpty — the crash reported in 2020 is fixed by defensive coding introduced in PRs #3069, #2166, and subsequent cleanup.
result.approach: No action needed — verify by attempting to reproduce with current build; if still reproducible, add an InvokeRequired + IsDisposed double-check in ConnDock_ContentRemoved before calling ShowHideConnectionTabs.
